Text:
For those of you who are wont to moan about the lossless format I have used, then the following application will convert to whatever format you want:


http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6588492/dBpowerAMP_Music_Converter_14.2__-__CD_Ripper___FLAC_to_MP3


You may need to go to the dBpoweramp site in order to download the free codec you need.

Take care
Neil

Asking people to go download another application and install it on their systems seems like a heck of a lot... But Apple users never cease to stun me with their "we are the center of the computing universe" superiority complex. 

For the love of God, if you're gonna post a nearly 17GB file, do it in a format that more than 7% of the computing public uses regularly. Yeah I can figure out how to do what you suggested, but it would have made a lot more sense to post in FLAC. It's ridiculous to expect the public to conform to you rather than the other way around.

neil1966hardy fantastic upload great work but please upload in flac and not in this format. we don't care of compatibility dude we just want quality and satisfaction. We can convert flac files to whatever format whenever needed, so please do it in flac only. But however its the complete edition with few missing tracks.
